channel.title: .Just Makeing Post With Error Please Try And Fix
channel.description:
Well here are a few things i need help with please put the numbers when answering so i know which one your on about ! Cheers
Deltascape - 317 Server.
1. Range Works PVP But Doesnt Work When Attacking Monsters Any Help On That Would Be Good As I Have Never Worked On It Before.
2. How To Get Ancients To Work.
3. How To Take PVP drops out and get back to the normal when you die you loose your stuff.
4. How to add a multi zone not just 1v1.
5. How to add customs to client.
6. How to change bonuses on armour , weapons etc ...
THANKS IN ADVANCE !!
